text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff… puff… huff… puff…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Exhale…

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, look, it's Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah. Still pint-sized as ever.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you two…

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Well, well. Look at that uniform… So you got into Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Isn't it a little hard, Taishin? Trying to be a Tracen runner I mean.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Seriously, we're no Umamusume, but I bet we could win against you!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Haha, guess we're good enough for Tracen too.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Geez, still making that same sour face. What a loser. Let's get outta 
here.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: Laters. ♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Tch!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishiiin! We're back! And we brought the goods—TAIYAKI!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? You in a bad mood?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's probably because you took so long shopping, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But Taishin's always like, "I don't care. Get anything." Between crepes 
and ice cream, I didn't know what to choose!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But look, I got you the super-duper size, so you can get big and 
strong!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: S-super-duper?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No worries if you can't finish the whole thing—we'll help out! Let's sit 
down over there and eat.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come on, they'll get cold if we don't hurry! Pick up the pace!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Really… Let's go, Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: 'Kay.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: All right, one more lap!
Only a few days remain before the Satsuki Sho.

Winning Ticket is entering the final stage of her training. Today, I'm 
having her do runs outside the academy.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm so full of energy! Let's get this extra training going!
choice_data_list: That's the spirit! Keep it up until the race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! All riiight! Time to get fired UP!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's Winning Ticket and her trainer. I take it you're about to start 
training.
Sure are. Why, what's up?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Well, you see, a group of reporters have gathered in front of the 
academy.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I'm thinking of asking them to leave so they don't interfere with 
training. There are only a few days left until the Satsuki Sho, after all.

She's right. With so little time left, we should be getting in as much 
training as possible. It'd be best if they left.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, let me talk to them! No way could Iet down any fans or reporters!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Oh? But your training…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It's fine! I'm not trying to skip it or anything. I'm still gonna do exactly 
as we planned!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So! Looks like I'll be at it until curfew! You'll stick with me the whole 
time, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, let's go see those reporters then!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Ah! Winning Ticket's here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Ticket! Are you taking questions?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoa! No need to push. I'll answer everyone's questions!

With the Satsuki Sho so close, Winning Ticket is drawing more 
attention from the public eye.
Feeling it her duty, she answers all the questions as best she can.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Winning Ticket! How's your training coming along?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um… It's really great! I can tell I'm getting better each day!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Are you worried about your two rivals running in the same race?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No way! I'm totally excited to race with them! And not just in the 
Satsuki Sho, but in the Derby too!

As the gracious racer attends to the swarm of journalists, Narita 
Taishin walks out of the academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You look like you're in a jam.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Taishin! Hehe… You know me, couldn't refuse.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Narita Taishin! Regarding your first race of the Classics, will you—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I've got training. Later, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh… O-okay.
Narita Taishin dodges the sudden question and briskly walks away.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Biwa Hayahide avoided us just before too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: She did?

I guess Ticket's rivals are too focused on training for the upcoming 
Satsuki Sho.

While watching her little press event, I try to think up a new training 
regimen so that she doesn't get left behind.

Before we know it, the day of the Satsuki Sho—the first race of the 
Classics in which all three members of BNW are competing—is here.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! Just hearing "Classic race" is making me nervous!
Because every Classic is a big deal, not just the Derby.
Because every Classic is a big deal, not just the Derby.

We've trained hard for this though. You're in tip-top shape. All that's 
left is to race up a storm and take the crown!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin and Hayahide will be with me too! So I'll be able to go all out!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'm ready!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Taishin! Hayahide! HEEEEEY!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut up! I told you, the echo in here is crazy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I can't help it. I'm so happy to race together!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I understand your enthusiasm. We've been through many races and 
are finally standing on the same track. It's deeply moving.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I guess… it's kinda cool that all three of us made it here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: However, running together is not our goal.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
To run and to win… We've given everything for that reason. It was all 
to be here, on this day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Me too. I've wanted nothing more than to make it here. So I'm gonna 
race like never before and win this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I don't intend to lose either!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Expectations are high for the favorite racer entering now—BNW 
member, Winning Ticket!

Winning Ticket gives a big wave to her fans in the stands as she 
heads for the starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are entering the gate! The first race of the Classics, the 
Satsuki Sho… begins!
